entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Upsala
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:49 PM CDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Upsala 6:00 PM CDT Monday 20 March 2023
Temperature: -5.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.3 kPa rising
Humidity: 21 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -24.4°C
Wind: NE 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:47 PM CDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness early in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:47 PM CDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight. Snow beginning after midnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:47 PM CDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. High plus 3. Forecast issued 4:47 PM CDT Monday 20 March 2023
